snippet.title: 7Days Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
7Days is a pixelated, psychological, Horror Indie Game released in May 2013.
Developed entirely by RevoLab:
Adriano Tumminelli & Gianmarco Terenzi.

DOWNLOAD
GameJolt: http://gamejolt.com/games/adventure/7days/14592/
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/7days/downloads/7days


Special thanks to Nicola Porcu for Trailer's background Music.
Music Link: https://soundcloud.com/nicolaporcu/the-last-hope-7days-main.
